resources.string: People interacting with the project Blois : Savoir Écouter

Blois : Savoir Écouter est un projet hybride. La structure de bois et papier est réelle, la tablette tactile est intégrée et les applications mobiles fournies sont numériques. Dans cette œuvre participative, les Blésois peuvent ajouter au contenu du projet soit un dessin, soit une histoire écrite à la main, soit des contenus numériques (sons, images ou vidéos).
People interacting with the project Blois : Savoir Écouter
detailed view of the sculpture Blois : Savoir Écouter

Ce projet est né du désir de comprendre l’espace urbain dans un contexte sculptural. Mon objet est de créer un travail qui est un stimulant de l’engagement personnel avec l’espace urbain et des logiques socio-spatiales des individus et des communautés qu’ils composent. La démarche que j’ai adoptée pour réaliser l’oeuvre s’intègre dans une logique de long terme, dans la mesure où je souhaite cibler une grande variété de publics.

\"Application\" means the software application \"Blois: Listening\" published and provided by the Artist, providing access to the Services, which is available free of charge from Apple\'s \"Apple Store\" and Google\'s \"Google Play Store\" to be downloaded by the User on his terminal Apple iOS and Android. The Application also includes Content, software, programs, tools (programming, navigation, …), databases, operating systems, documentation and all other elements and services of which it is composed, updates and new versions that can be made to the Application by the Artist.

\"Content\" means, without limitation, the structure of the Application, editorial content, drawings, illustrations, images, photographs, graphic charts, trademarks, logos, acronyms , audiovisual works, multimedia works, visual content, audio and sound content, and any other content within the Application and / or any other component of the Application.
\"Services\" refers to the various features and services offered by the Application.
\"Site\" means the official website of the Blois: Learn to Listen whose address is the following: www.savoir-ecouter.aprille.net
\"Site\" means the official website of the Blois: Learn to Listen whose address is the following: www.savoir-ecouter.aprille.net

\"User\" or \"You\" means a natural or legal person who has previously obtained the authorization of his parents or the person having parental authority and who has downloaded the Application for his own needs, strictly personal and non-commercial, non-profit, direct or indirect.

The present general conditions of use (hereinafter referred to as \"GCU\") are intended to determine the rules for the use of the mobile application \"Blois: Knowledge Listen\" (hereinafter referred to as the \"Application\") published by the \'Artist, Aprille Best Glover (hereinafter referred to as the \"Artist\").

The purpose of the Application is to give you access to information and news about the City of Blois proposed by the Artist and to allow you to make a reservation of services through a hyperlink leading you to the page of reservation of the Site.
Several Services may be offered to the User and in particular:
- the plan of the Blois: Learn to Listen / itineraries;
- les fonctionnalités de partage avec les réseaux sociaux de Facebook et Twitter ;
This list is not exhaustive and can be modified at any time by Blois: Knowing Listen without its responsibility being able to be engaged as such by anybody.
Terms beginning with a capital letter within these Terms, whether used singly or in the plural, shall have the meanings given to them below:
To access and use the Application, you must have a compatible phone or a mobile terminal and access to the Internet.
The application can be downloaded free of charge from the \"Apple Store\" and \"Google Play Store\" platforms on the following mobile devices:
- mobile phone with Android® OS 4.4 operating system up to OS 4.4.
- Apple® iphone® mobile phone with the iOS operating system on iOS 8 or iOS 9
The software version of the Application may be updated from time to time to add new features and services.

The use of the geolocation functionality of the Application requires the prior express consent of the user to be geolocated. To do this, the user will have to activate the geolocation function directly in the settings of his mobile terminal if he wishes and accept that the Application can use it. This feature can be deactivated or activated at any time and without charge.
Thanks to the acceptance of the GPS-based geolocation function of the mobile phone and the Application, the user can:
- be guided during the calculation of itineraries in the City of Blois;

The Application is offered free of charge to Users without subscription costs from the mobile operator, excluding connection costs and access to the Internet network and any additional cost invoiced for loading the data.
- receive messages of an informative nature during the session of use of the Application.
The TOUs are applicable to any User of the Application and the Services.

The artist would like to thank the city of Blois, the Caisse des Depots and the association Odeur de la Color for their technical and financial support. In addition, she would like to a special thanks the project\'s institutional partners (ALCV, the APF, the hospital center of Blois, the Espace Mirabeau, the Espace Quinière, FabLab Robert-Houdin, Lycée horticole public de Blois, the Maison des Provinces, the Médiathèque Maurice-Genevoix, the Observatoire Loire, EHPAD La Roselière and Association Valentin Haüy)
Finally, the artist would like to thank the hundreds of residents of Blois who generously gave the time and creativity to make this project a success.
